hotel-app-store.title: SiteMinder hotel app store
hotel-app-store.content: Apps and integrations to optimise your business.

reservations.title: Today's reservations
reservations.body: Check-in for the camp will begin in the morning for the first day. The camp will officially start with a group orientation lecture. Check-out will be at the completion of the Award Ceremony

notifications.title: Training
notifications.body: Three training sessions per day (morning, afternoon and evening). Play heaps of officiated games, maybe your team will be the champions of your age group. It is not compulsory for a child to attend the evening session but it is highly recommended. Players train and play in their own age groups.
notifications.content: Apps and integrations to optimise your business.

warning.title: Activity risk warning
warning.body: Campers may undertake supervised activities on camp that could possibly cause injury.
